alert.note: Alert for Johnston; Marshall (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 2:57AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Johnston and northern Marshall Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 257 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mannsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Madill, Tishomingo, Dickson, Mannsville, Ravia, Milburn, Russett, Little City, northeastern Lake Texoma, and Oakland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Severe weather is not expected and no warnings are anticipated at this time. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
